Iran’s Natanz Steel to commission melt shop in coming months

Tuesday, 10 May 2011 17:35:24 (GMT+3)   |  


Iranian steel producer Natanz Steel has stated that it will commission its melt shop with an annual capacity of 600,000 mt in the next few months. Based in Natanz city in the central Iranian province of Isfahan, Natanz Steel already has three rolling lines capable of producing rebar and wire rod. The new melt shop will produce billet and will feed the existing rolling lines.
